projects.title: GPO Management and Implementation
projects.description: Designed and implemented comprehensive Group Policy Objects (GPO) to manage and configure operating systems, applications, and user settings in a Windows Server environment. This project focused on enhancing security, efficiency, and consistency across the organization's network.

projects.title: Custom Cloud Infrastructure using VMware
projects.description: Developed a custom cloud infrastructure leveraging VMware technologies including vCenter, ESXi, and Windows Server. This project involved the full lifecycle of setting up and managing a virtualized environment.

projects.title: DHCP Server
projects.description: Administered the installation of DHCP server on Ubuntu via ISC-DHCP-SERVER. Tested the framework by creating machines and performed troubleshooting.

projects.title: Linux web-server
projects.description: Advocated installation of APACHE on Linux (Cent OS) to host the server. Inspected web server and worked on issues involved in running website.

projects.title: Windows-Linux Integration
projects.description: Collaborated with teammates to merge Windows active directory and Linux machine to access files of both the systems. Assessed bugs and evaluated the integration by sharing files from both the systems.
